lead_paragraph: The Astana team of Vincenzo Nibali, the defending champion in the Tour de France, has survived a review of its top-tier racing status ordered after several doping cases.

headline.main: Tour de France Champion’s Team Retains Status

snippet: The Astana team of Vincenzo Nibali, the defending champion in the Tour de France, has survived a review of its top-tier racing status ordered after several doping cases.
abstract: Independent licensing panel International Cycling Union reviews Astana team and decides it can keep World Tour status, despite several cases of doping.
